title: Must Watch: Tom Pagès executes double front flip to base jump off 135m cliff in France
content:
Yes, this is a motocross video, but I shan’t be apologetic for sharing. With the sheer guts involved in this maneuver, we can’t help but watch in awe as Red Bull Freestyle MX athlete, Tom Pagès, launches his moto off this 135m cliff, completing not one but two front flips before deploying a parachute. The post Must Watch: Tom Pagès executes double front flip to base jump off 135m cliff in France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
